productContext.defaultContextMessage: Sign in or create an account

list.signOut: Sign out of Creative Cloud before leaving the machine.

shared_t.text: To help protect your privacy and security:

confirmation.description: Please submit a report if you do not recognize this sign-in.
confirmation.title: Wait, there might be something suspicious

reported.description: You’ve successfully submitted the details of this incident to Adobe. This will help prevent future harmful incidents.
reported.title: Thanks for reporting

success.description: You’ve successfully signed in. Feel free to close this browser tab and return to where you previously left off.
success.title: You're all set

errors.invalidLength: The email address length should be between 6 and 60 characters.
errors.blockCreateAccount: No account associated with the email address
errors.accountCreationBlockedByPolicy: Can't sign in with this email address
errors.personalAccountDeactivated: Your Personal Account has been deactivated. Please review our {0} and contact {1} if you believe this is an error.
errors.companyOrSchoolAccountDeactivated: Your Company or School Account has been deactivated. Please review our {0} and contact {1} if you believe this is an error.
errors.accountTemporarilyLocked: Your account is temporarily locked. Try again later.

block.individual: Personal Accounts are not supported. Continue with a Company or School Account to access the service. {0} Learn more {1}
block.enterprise: Company or School Accounts are not supported. Continue with a Personal Account to access the service. {0} Learn more {1}
block.federated: Company or School Accounts are not supported. Continue with a Personal Account to access the service. {0} Learn more {1}

errors.accountNotFound: Check your email address or {0} create a new account {1}
errors.notTheSame: The specified emails must be identical
errors.socialIsDisabled: Do you usually sign in with Facebook, Google or Apple? Enter your email below and we'll help you sign in.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.text: An unknown error has occurred. Here's the error code if you want to contact customer support

tokenInvalid.title: Something went wrong
tokenInvalid.text: Continue and we'll pick up where we left off.

mfaSoftLocked.title: Try again later
mfaSoftLocked.text: For security reasons, your access is temporarily disabled. For more details, contact {0}.

assetMigration.title: Sorry, your access has been denied
assetMigration.text: Your account is temporarily unavailable while your content is being migrated.

passwordResetRequired.title: Password change required
passwordResetRequired.text: To protect the security of your account, you must change your password before continuing. Please check your inbox for an email we just sent you; it contains instructions for how to reset your password. Once you're done you can log into your account.

socialOnly.title: Social sign in not supported
socialOnly.text: You have previously signed in with a social account, but unfortunately this application doesn't support social sign in. To continue, please create a password for your account.

incomplete.title: Additional account details required
incomplete.text: This account is missing some important information. Please check your inbox for an email we just sent you; it contains instructions for how to complete your account. Once you're done you can log into your account.

additionalAccountDetails.title: Verify your identity
additionalAccountDetails.text: We need some additional information, but first we need to confirm your identity.

passwordChangeRequired.title: Update your Adobe password
passwordChangeRequired.text: To help protect your Adobe account, we have reset your password. To verify your identity and set a new password, please click "Continue" below.

passwordChangeOnFirstLogin.title: Change your Adobe password
passwordChangeOnFirstLogin.text: To help protect your Adobe account, you need to choose a new password. You'll be required to verify your identity to continue.

socialFallback.title: Social sign in not supported
socialFallback.text: You have previously signed in with a social account, but unfortunately this application doesn't support social sign in. To continue, please verify your identity and create a password for your account.

serviceEligibility.title: Sorry, your access has been denied
serviceEligibility.text: You are ineligible to use this product or service due to the Service Eligibility Requirements. {0} Learn more {1}

blockPolicy.title: Account type not supported
blockPolicy.text: Continue with a different account to access the service.

errors.enableJavascript: Please enable JavaScript and try to sign in again.
errors.noInternet: Your computer seems to be offline. Please check your internet and try again.

password.title: Enter your password
password.backLink: Sign in to a different account

captcha.copy: Protected by reCAPTCHA and subject to the Google {0} and {1}.

errors.incorrectPassword: That’s an incorrect password. Try again.
errors.invalidLength: The password length should be between 6 and 100 characters.

mfa.title: 2-step verification
mfa.changeMethod: Use another method to receive the code

description.email: Enter the code we've sent to {0}
description.phone: Enter the code we sent to the phone number ending in {0}.
description.phoneAfterConfirmation: If the phone number associated with your account ends in {0} then you'll receive a code. Enter that code below.
description.totp: Enter the code generated by your authenticator app.

code.noCodeReceivedHelp: Allow a few minutes for the message to arrive.
code.wasResent: We have sent you another code.
code.invalid: That's an invalid code. Try again.
code.expired: That's an expired code. Try again.

push.title: Waiting for your approval...
push.description: We've sent an authentication request to your device. Please approve using Adobe Authenticator.
push.enterTotpCode: Enter the code generated by your Adobe Authenticator app.
push.noRequestReceivedHelp: Try opening the Adobe Authenticator app.
push.wasResent: We have sent you another request.
push.expiredContent: Please resend another request if you would like to sign in.
push.rejected: You've chosen to reject the authentication request.

chooser.sms: Text code to number ending in

error.tryAnotherMethod: An error has occurred. Please try another method to receive the code.

wait.title: Waiting for your approval...
wait.description: Sign in using the Adobe Account Access app. Tap the push notification we sent or open the app if you didn’t get one.

bingo.title: Open the Adobe Account Access app and tap:
bingo.description: This is the first time you’re signing in from this device or location. For additional security, please tap the number {0} in the Adobe Account Access app to approve this sign in.

toast.noRequestReceivedHelp: Try opening the Adobe Account Access app.

wrongBingo.description: You can try again by sending another request, or selecting another way to sign in.

signup.dateOfBirthTooltipInfo: We collect your date of birth for account authentication and recovery purposes, and to ensure age-appropriate access to content. Adobe values your privacy and trust. For more information, please visit our {0}.

passwordRules.title: Create a password that
passwordRules.containBothLowerUpper: contains both lower (a-z) and upper case letters (A-Z)
passwordRules.containNumberOrSymbol: contains at least one number (0-9) or a symbol
passwordRules.containNumberAndSymbol: contains at least one number (0-9) and a symbol
passwordRules.notContainNameOrEmail: does not contain your name or email address
passwordRules.notCommonlyOrPreviouslyUsed: is not commonly used or a previous password

success.title: You're all set

unsupportedBrowser.title: Browser not supported
unsupportedBrowser.text: To use the current website, please update your browser to the latest version or try a different browser.

termsOfUse.title: Updated Terms of Use
termsOfUse.explanation: By closing this window, you’ll be unable to continue using Adobe apps and services. By clicking “Accept and Continue,” you agree that you have read and accepted the {0}.

dateOfBirth.title: Add your date of birth
dateOfBirth.explanation: We collect your date of birth for account authentication and recovery purposes, and to ensure age-appropriate content.

profileChooser.title: Select a profile to sign in

t2eInvite.title: Welcome to {0}
t2eInvite.explanation: Since you already have an Adobe plan associated with this email address, we'll separate profiles for you, each with dedicated storage. {0}
t2eInvite.profileListTitle: Here are the profiles we'll set up:

invalidError.title: Something went wrong
invalidError.text: This invitation has already been used or was sent to a different account. If you think this is an error, please contact the person who invited you.

invite.title: Welcome to {0}
invite.explanation: As a member of the organization, you’ll have access to the apps and storage your administrator assigned you.

invalidError.title: Something went wrong
invalidError.text: This invitation has already been used or was sent to a different account. If you think this is an error, please contact the person who invited you.

completeAccount.title: Complete your account
completeAccount.createPassword: Please create a password for your account.

chooser.title: Now, tell us where you'd like to store all your content
chooser.explanation: Select the best profile for the content currently stored in Adobe cloud storage. (This doesn't apply to content stored outside of Adobe cloud storage.) We recommend selecting your Business Profile if your content is primarily related to your business plan (such as Creative Cloud for teams or enterprise, Acrobat DC for teams or enterprise). Don't worry, after your profiles are set up - which should only take a few minutes - you'll be able to move content between them at any time. {0}
chooser.learnMore: Things to consider before you choose

polling.title: We're updating your account
polling.explanation: It should take less than a minute.

confirmation.title: Confirm your profile selection
confirmation.explanation: All content, including anything personal or related to your individual plan, will be available in your Business Profile. Once your profiles are set up, you can move content between them at any time.
confirmation.authAccountExplanation: All content, including anything related to your business plan (Creative Cloud for teams or enterprise), will be available in your {0}. Once your profiles are set up, you can move content between them at any time.
confirmation.personalContentWarning: any personal content or content that is not part of

introduction.title: Introducing profile selection
introduction.explanation: Since you have multiple Adobe plans associated with your email address, we've created separate profiles for you, each with dedicated storage.
introduction.profileListTitle: Here are the profiles we've set up:

timeout.title: This move will take just a little bit longer
timeout.explanation: We'll send you an email as soon as we're done so you know when you can sign back into your account. Thanks for your patience. {0}

assetMigrationFailed.title: Unexpected error with your Adobe cloud storage
assetMigrationFailed.text: We’re sorry — we encountered an error with your account while upgrading your company’s Adobe cloud storage. Here’s how you can get to work right away:
assetMigrationFailed.option1: {0} to continue working as before. This profile includes the apps and services associated with your business plan.
assetMigrationFailed.option2: If you had existing content in Adobe storage, rest assured  it’s  safe. It’s been moved to your new Personal Profile due to an error.
assetMigrationFailed.apologizeForAnyInconvenience: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please {0} if you have any questions.

introduction.title: Introducing profile selection
introduction.explanation: Since you have multiple Adobe business plans associated with your email address, we've created separate profiles for you, each with dedicated storage. {0}
introduction.yourBusinessProfiles: Your Business Profiles correspond to your business plans provided by each organization
introduction.yourPersonalProfile: Your Personal Profile includes your existing content stored in Adobe cloud storage. (This doesn't apply to content stored outside of Adobe cloud storage.) Don't worry — you can move content between profiles at any time.
introduction.note: Note: You may see a partial list of Business Profiles until they're all set up, which may take a few days. Until then, please select your Personal Profile to continue working as usual.

complete.title: Your Business Profile setup is complete
complete.explanation: All your Business Profiles have been successfully set up and are ready to use.
complete.yourBusinessProfiles: {0} By doing so, you'll access the apps and services provided by the corresponding organization.
complete.yourPersonalProfile: Any content previously stored in Adobe cloud storage is located in your Personal Profile (This doesn't apply to content stored outside of Adobe cloud storage.) {0} {1} that shows you how to manage your profiles.
complete.selectTheBusinessProfile: Select the Business Profile you wish to work in.
complete.recommendation: We recommend that you move the content to the appropriate Business Profile.

updatePrimaryEmail.title: Update Your Email
updatePrimaryEmail.explanation: The {0} domain is now managed by {1}. Please enter a {2} to continue using your account. None of the products or services will be affected by this change.

jarvis.contactUs: Contact us again for more information

jumpConfirmation.title: Confirm sign-in account here again
